rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: An inviting entrance with Art Deco finishes and Vastu-aligned entrance to channel positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for natural light, decorated in Art Deco style.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining space complementing the living room, adheres to Vastu principles by aligning seating east-west.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with Art Deco detailing and ample ventilation, designed for efficiency and natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with a window overlooking the garden, ensuring a peaceful environment.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Vastu-compliant bathroom placement to ensure water flow is balanced.
